original_title: The Moody Blues - Inside The Music [2009]
overview: Get to grips with the Moody Blues, Inside the Music. First class performance footage analysed by members of the original production teams and various Moody Blues insiders. Including: - Derek Varnals; Decca engineer from 1963-1980 and the man who mixed all but one the classic seven Moody Blues albums. - Tony Clarke, the producer of (amongst many others) the Moody Blues from 1966 to 1979. - Keith Altham, journalist and independent rock agent from the 1970 s, who represented the Moody s alongside a multitude of other talent. - John Mendelssohn, musician and journalist. - Highlights from their best and biggest tracks!
title: The Moody Blues - Inside The Music [2009]
